page.title: 14Noranside Institution
page.content: Noranside Institution was opened as a Tuberculosis Hospital.About 1960 it was transformed into a Borstal and in 1984 it became a Penal Institution for boys aged between sixteen and twenty one years. The officers work shifts. Earlyshift is from 6.30a.m-2.30a.m. Lateshift is from 1.30p.m-10.00p.m. Nightshift is from 10.00p.m-6.00a.m. There are two officers on the nightshift.One stays inside and the other one patrols the grounds. Other officers such as the works department, farm and garden work from 8.00a.m-5.00p.m.The inmates receive visitors at the weekend.There are roughly about 75 inmates serving time in the prison. The inmates do different jobs during the day like working with the instructors.They teach painting,
